How to run MySQL + ftp + php server on android - ksweb

How to run MySQL + ftp + php server on android - ksweb

Posted on February 2, 2021 · Last updated February 4, 2021

AJT20

‚Ä¢ Pros:

‚Ä¢ Run lighttpd, nginx, apache, mysql, ftp, php servers right from your phone

‚Ä¢ Best use for integration with pydroid to run python+sql in android

‚Ä¢ Steps:

  1. Install KSWEB.

    Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.kslabs.ksweb

  2. At the top menu, under the ‚ÄòLIGHTTPD‚Äô tab, check ‚Äòenable server‚Äô to be turned on. You can also choose ‚Äònginx‚Äô or ‚Äòapache‚Äô.

  3. At the top menu, under the ‚ÄòMYSQL‚Äô tab, check ‚Äòenable server‚Äô to be turned on.

  4. Now open the app. Under the ‚ÄòSTATUS‚Äô tab, turn on ksweb service.

  5. Now under the ‚ÄòTOOLS‚Äô tab, in the ‚ÄòMain‚Äô menu, click ‚ÄòphpMyAdmin‚Äô. Now Choose the server you turned on.

  6. You‚Äôll be redirected to your default browser with phpmyadmin panel opened.

  7. In this panel, enter ‚Äòadmin‚Äô as usernane and leave the password as blank.

  8. Login. You‚Äôll be able to see default database. You can manage your databases here.

    Yes you have ran sql server on your and successfully!
